x_SPDF_CAVEAT: This is a prototype implementation which may change or be eliminated at any time. The metadata returned by info and data may be different. The metadata values returned by a data request are more accurate. The two data JSON formats do not conform to the HAPI specification.  The official cdaweb HAPI server is available at https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/hapi
description: ACE Magnetometer level 2 data, 16-second averages of field magnitude and GSE and GSM Cartesian components, plus standard deviations, plus ACE location data. The data are accessible via ftp in HDF and CDF from the ACE Science Center and CDAWeb, respectively, and in ASCII format from the value-added interfaces at those sites. The "parameter keys" given below are as used by CDAWeb. One-sec, 4-min, 1-hr, 1-day and 27-day averages are also available via the access paths given below.

parameters.name: BGSEc
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in GSE Cartesian coordinates (16 sec)

parameters.name: BGSM
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in GSM coordinates (16 sec)

parameters.name: dBrms
parameters.description: RMS of magnetic field magnitude (16 sec period)

parameters.name: SC_pos_GSE
parameters.description: ACE s/c position in GSE coordinates

parameters.name: SC_pos_GSM
parameters.description: ACE s/c position in GSM coordinates
